reviews.desc: Don't just take our word for it. Here's what people are saying about their experience with Evenza.

hero.title: Why Evenza?
hero.description: We’re here to transform how people discover and book events — smarter, safer, and easier than ever.

story.title: Our Story
story.paragraph1: Evenza started with the question: Why isn't booking events easier in a digital age? What began as frustration evolved into a vision for a smarter, seamless way to connect people with events they love.
story.paragraph2: It grew into a platform focused on creating a better experience for discovering and booking events.
story.paragraph3: Today, Evenza helps millions discover and book events, making the experience easy and joyful.

values.title: Our Values
values.description: These core principles guide everything we do at Evenza, from how we build our platform to how we interact with our users and partners.

user.title: User-Focused Experience
user.description: We put our users first in everything we do, creating intuitive experiences that make booking events simple and enjoyable.

quality.title: Quality Events
quality.description: We carefully curate and verify all events on our platform to ensure they meet our high standards of quality and authenticity.

pricing.title: Transparent Pricing
pricing.description: We believe in clear, upfront pricing with no hidden fees, so you always know exactly what you're paying for.

security.title: Security & Trust
security.description: Your security is paramount. We use industry-leading encryption and fraud detection to keep your data and transactions safe.

global.title: Global Perspective
global.description: We embrace diversity and inclusion, showcasing events from cultures and communities around the world.

community.title: Community Support
community.description: We donate a portion of our proceeds to support arts education and cultural programs in underserved communities.

team.title: Meet Our Team
team.description: The passionate people behind Evenza who work every day to bring amazing events to your fingertips.

terms.title: Terms and Conditions
terms.one.title: 1. Acceptance of Terms
terms.one.content: By accessing and using this website, you agree to be bound by these terms and conditions. If you do not agree, you should not use the site.
terms.two.title: 2. Event Booking
terms.two.content: Event bookings are subject to availability. All booking requests must be completed with accurate information, and payment must be confirmed for the booking to be valid.
terms.three.title: 3. Payment Terms
terms.three.content: Payments for event bookings must be made through approved payment methods only. We do not accept other payment methods. All prices are in the local currency and include applicable taxes.
terms.four.title: 4. Cancellation and Refund
terms.four.content: You may cancel your booking up to 48 hours before the event for a full refund. Cancellations after this period will incur a cancellation fee according to the event provider’s policy.
terms.five.title: 5. User Responsibilities
terms.five.content: Users are responsible for ensuring the accuracy of all information provided during registration and booking. You are also responsible for all activity conducted through your account.
terms.six.title: 6. Prohibited Activities
terms.six.content: Users are prohibited from engaging in any illegal activities including but not limited to fraud, impersonation, or harassment of users or event organizers. Any violation will result in account termination.
terms.seven.title: 7. Privacy and Data Protection
terms.seven.content: We are committed to protecting your privacy. We collect and process your personal data in accordance with our privacy policy available on our website. By using this service, you agree to our data practices.
terms.eight.title: 8. Event Changes
terms.eight.content: We reserve the right to make changes to event details, including dates, times, and locations, due to unforeseen circumstances. We will notify you of such changes and offer alternatives if necessary.
terms.nine.title: 9. Limitation of Liability
terms.nine.content: We are not liable for any direct, indirect, or consequential damages resulting from your use of the site or participation in events. Participation is at your own risk, and we disclaim any liability for injuries or losses.
terms.ten.title: 10. Force Majeure
terms.ten.content: We are not responsible for delays or failure to fulfill our obligations due to causes beyond our control, including natural disasters, government actions, or unforeseen events.
terms.eleven.title: 11. Account Termination
terms.eleven.content: We reserve the right to suspend or terminate your account if we believe you have violated any of these terms and conditions. Termination may occur without prior notice, and unused bookings may be forfeited.
terms.twelve.title: 12. Governing Law
terms.twelve.content: These terms and conditions are governed by the laws of the Arab Republic of Egypt and international regulations. Any disputes will be resolved before the competent courts in Egypt.
terms.thirteen.title: 13. Amendments to Terms
terms.thirteen.content: We reserve the right to update or modify these terms and conditions at any time. Changes become effective once posted on this page. We will notify users of major updates via email or site notifications.
terms.fourteen.title: 14. Contact
terms.fourteen.content: If you have any questions about these terms or need help with booking, contact us through the support section of our website or at: {{supportEmail}}.
terms.fifteen.title: 15. User Acknowledgment
terms.fifteen.content: By using our services, you acknowledge that you have read and understood these terms and conditions, and agree to comply with them. You also agree to follow all applicable laws during your use of the services.

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.a1: You can purchase tickets by browsing our events, selecting the one you're interested in, and clicking the "Book Now" button. Follow the checkout process to complete your purchase.
faq.q2: What payment methods do you accept?
faq.a2: We accept Stripe and Evenza Wallet for secure and fast payments.
faq.q3: Can I get a refund for my tickets?
faq.a3: Yes, you can request a refund up to 48 hours before the event. The request will be reviewed by our team and processed within 5-7 business days. No service fees will be refunded.
faq.q4: How do I become an event organizer?
faq.a4: To become an event organizer, sign up for an account and choose "Organizer" as your role. You’ll need to upload a valid ID for verification before creating events.
faq.q5: Where can I find my tickets?
faq.a5: Your tickets will be sent to your email and will also be available in the "My Tickets" section of your account.
faq.q6: Do I need to create an account to book tickets?
faq.a6: Yes, creating an account helps us securely store your bookings, manage your tickets, and provide personalized event recommendations.
faq.q7: Can I transfer my ticket to someone else?
faq.a7: Ticket transfers are currently not available. Each ticket is tied to the original purchaser and cannot be transferred.
faq.q8: What happens if an event is cancelled?
faq.a8: If an event is cancelled, you will automatically receive a full refund to your original payment method within 5–7 business days.
faq.q9: How can I contact customer support?
faq.a9: You can contact our support team via the 'Help' section on our website or by emailing evenza123@gmail.com.
faq.q10: Is there a mobile app available?
faq.a10: Evenza is a web app, accessible on any device through your browser. You can browse events, book tickets, and manage your account easily without installing anything.
